cu.explanation_en: Setting the port to an out-of-range value like 99999 will cause network interface binding failures and prevent proper communication with the AMF.

du.explanation_en: Setting SSB block power to 100 dBm exceeds the maximum allowed power and may cause hardware damage or transmission failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 SSB 區塊功率設定為 100 dBm 超過允許的最大功率，可能導致硬體損壞或傳輸失敗。
